extractedText:
John Doe1234 Elm Street, Apartment 56City, State, ZIP CodePhone: (123) 456-7890Email: johndoe@email.com



Objective

Hardworking and reliable kitchen worker with over 3 years of experience in food preparation, cleaning, and supporting kitchen staff. Seeking a position in a fast-paced kitchen where I can contribute my skills, work ethic, and passion for cooking and food safety.



Experience

Kitchen AssistantThe Gourmet Bistro – City, StateJanuary 2022 – Present

Assist in preparing ingredients for dishes, including chopping vegetables, marinating proteins, and assembling plating garnishes.

Maintain cleanliness and organization of kitchen workstations, including washing dishes and cleaning kitchen equipment.

Ensure all food items are properly stored and labeled, adhering to food safety and sanitation guidelines.

Support chefs and line cooks during busy service hours by ensuring timely delivery of prepped ingredients and supplies.

Operate kitchen machinery such as food processors, slicers, and blenders.

Dishwasher/Prep CookSunshine Caf√© – City, StateJune 2020 – December 2021

Washed dishes, pots, and utensils, ensuring they were properly sanitized and ready for use.

Assisted in basic food prep tasks such as peeling, cutting, and mixing ingredients.

Maintained cleanliness of kitchen surfaces and assisted with stock rotation to reduce food waste.

Followed food safety standards, including proper storage and labeling of perishable items.

Assisted chefs during peak hours to ensure smooth kitchen operations.



Education

High School DiplomaCity High School – City, StateGraduated: 2019



Skills

Food Preparation: Skilled in chopping, dicing, slicing, and general food preparation tasks.

Kitchen Safety & Sanitation: Knowledge of food safety guidelines, sanitation procedures, and safe use of kitchen equipment.

Time Management: Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment, ensuring timely completion of tasks.

Teamwork: Excellent team player with a strong work ethic and willingness to take direction from chefs and kitchen leads.

Multitasking: Able to manage multiple tasks at once, especially during busy service hours.



Certifications

Food Handler’s CertificateIssued by: Local Health DepartmentDate: March 2023

Basic First Aid & CPR CertifiedIssued by: Red CrossDate: May 2023



References

Available upon request.
